InstalledItem.Name: Tarantula GT-870 Mark 2 Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 2

Fed by Gallenson Tactical’s patented SpinGlide drum ammunition system, the Tarantula GT-870 Mk2 can smoothly and accurately deliver a consistent stream of ballistic shells. Though it only has a moderate rate of fire, its trustworthy durability makes it a dependable addition to any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: Tarantula GT-870 Mark 3 Cannon
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Gallenson Tactical Systems
Item Type: Ballistic Cannon
Size: 3

Fed by Gallenson Tactical’s patented SpinGlide drum ammunition system, the Tarantula GT-870 Mk3 can smoothly and accurately deliver a consistent stream of ballistic shells. Though it only has a moderate rate of fire, its trustworthy durability makes it a dependable addition to any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S3 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 3

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. VariPucks will accept any weapon one size smaller than the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: CF-227 Badger Repeater
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Klaus & Werner
Item Type: Laser Repeater
Size: 2

The CF-227 Badger is Klaus & Werner’s dependable size two repeating laser. Its increased output and high rate of fire make it a solid contender in any fight.

InstalledItem.Name: Anvil Lightning F8C Turret
InstalledItem.Description: This remote turret provides mounts for two Size 2 weapons, an expansive field of fire, and precise control to give F8C pilots a comprehensive weapon system to get out of any situation.

InstalledItem.Name: MSD-442 Missile Rack
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Missile Rack
Manufacturer: Behring
Size: 4
Missiles: 4xS2

Behring’s MSD-442 "Marsden" is a complete ordnance storage and deployment system that can be mounted on any compatible size 4 hardpoint for the reliable and effective launch of four S2 missiles.

InstalledItem.Name: Ignite II Missile
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Firestorm Kinetics
Tracking Signal: Infrared
Size: 2

The Ignite is Firestorm's premier brand of heat-seeking strike missile that is the definition of Fire and Forget. Simply let it fly and enjoy the show.

Size: 2
Grade: B

Keep your shield’s heat from giving you away by using a Sheut. Another outstanding stealth shield generator from Ascension Astro.

InstalledItem.Name: Maelstrom
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Military

This military-grade component has been put through the paces by the UEE Navy, so you know the Maelstrom can handle the havoc of battle.

InstalledItem.Name: Polar
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Aegis Dynamics 
Size: 1
Grade: B
Class: Military

Built to the high demands of daily military service, Aegis’ Polar cooler features a reinforced frame for increased durability. You can rest assured that when you drop into the fires of combat, the Polar will keep your ship cool.

InstalledItem.Name: Expedition
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Tarsus 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Cruise through space confident that your perfectly balanced Expedition quantum drive from Tarsus will get you exactly where you’re going.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.
